name: Carpe Diem (itch) (mellilla)
description:
WELCOME TO CARPE DIEM!

A game where you need to defend against enemies that are invading Rome. 

To battle, click on the invasions that appear on the map - then, choose your army’s forces by picking cards. 

Remember that you won’t be able to change the order of playing them after your battle has started  - unless you give up some of your soldiers! 

In this game you can use use to upgrade cards in the shop to increase their strength.

 The harder the invasions are, the more necessary it will be to upgrade your cards, so remember to do it! 

In battles, the aim is to reduce your opponent’s HP to 0 before time runs out. If you’re stuck and you don’t want to play the card at the top of your hand, you can tap the deck of cards and it randomises a card for you from your deck.

You can also pay the amount of soldiers listed on the left of the card you want to play, if it’s out of order.  

You win the game when you reach full stability (measured on the scale at the top of your screen), which means that you have destroyed enough enemies. 

You lose the game if your stability reaches the bottom and - thus causing the Fall Of Rome.

 Enjoy defeating invaders, going fishing, upgrading cards and bringing the city to glory.
